features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete user authentication with email/password login, registration, OAuth integration, JWT tokens, and protected routes

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Modern landing page with hero section, feature showcase, statistics, testimonials, and call-to-action

features.name: User Dashboard
features.description: Personal user dashboard with booking statistics, recent bookings, booking trends chart, and quick actions

features.name: Hotels Browsing
features.description: Browse and search hotels with filters, view hotel details, ratings, amenities, and navigate to available rooms

features.name: Rooms Management
features.description: View available rooms with search filters for dates, guests, room types, view room details and pricing

features.name: Advanced Booking System
features.description: Complete booking workflow with real-time availability checking, dynamic pricing (weekend/holiday rates), guest information forms, and booking confirmation

features.name: User Bookings Management
features.description: View and manage user reservations with status tracking (upcoming, current, past, cancelled), booking details, and cancellation functionality

features.name: User Profile
features.description: User profile management with account settings and personal information

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Administrative panel for hotel and system management

features.name: Main Layout System
features.description: Responsive main layout with header, sidebar navigation, user menu, theme switching, and notifications

features.name: Theme System
features.description: Dark/light theme switching with consistent color schemes, responsive utilities, and styled component theming

features.name: State Management
features.description: Global state management with Zustand for authentication, hotels, rooms, reservations, and UI state

features.name: API Integration
features.description: Backend API integration with Spring Boot endpoints for authentication, hotels, rooms, and reservations

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Database integration with Supabase for real-time data, authentication, and PostgreSQL database

features.name: Booking Service
features.description: Advanced booking service with availability checking, dynamic pricing calculation, booking creation, and reference generation

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Mobile-first responsive design with breakpoint utilities and adaptive layouts

features.name: Application Routing
features.description: Client-side routing with React Router including protected routes and authentication guards
